item.title: Summary - Hurricane BLAS (EP3/EP032016)
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
item.description: ...BLAS BECOMES THE FIRST MAJOR HURRICANE OF THE EASTERN PACIFIC SEASON... As of 2:00 PM PDT Tue Jul 5 the center of BLAS was located near 14.3, -120.9 with movement W at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 954 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 125 mph.

nhc:Cyclone.nhc:name: BLAS
nhc:Cyclone.nhc:headline: ...BLAS BECOMES THE FIRST MAJOR HURRICANE OF THE EASTERN PACIFIC SEASON...
